review: Works quite well and all the features are nice, though it desperately needs a cooling system. As someone who likes to have tv on in the background it overheats quite quickly which diminishes the performance drastically. I rigged a cpu heat sink and fan to it and has worked perfectly ever since.

review: Easy to set up, easy to use, user friendly screens, reasonable price, what else can I say? It connects my TV with multiple media so I got to watch sports (ESPN3), News (Fox News), and movies (Netflix) as I want.

review: Love being able to watch amazon prime from on my tv thanks to the fire stick but overall i'm just more used to chromecast. Firestick is a good product I just prefer being able to use my ipad as my remote. I think it's because I am used to it after one year of having chromecast.
author: R. Kling "beens"

review: I love love love my fire stick! I was streaming video from my older kindle to the TV but I am so glad I bought this. I have had zero problems with streaming and the setup was very easy. I have handy and easy access to all of my purchased movies and music plus the great on demand selection! I also downloaded the remote app in my phone to go with it and that works awesome as well ! I would give this 6 stars if I could! Also when you are watching a series it conveniently ques up the next episode and starts playing when the current one ends!!! LOVE
